hero.title: Your Gateway to Future Finance
hero.description: Easy and safe to buy, store, send, swap tokens and collect NFTs. Trusted by 30+ millions users from 200+ countries and regions.

howItWorks.title: How it OneWallet Works
howItWorks.subtitle: OneWallet is trusted by global users

selfCustody.title: Self-Custody
selfCustody.description: This is the fundamental shift from traditional finance.

permissionless.title: Permissionless
permissionless.description: Anyone in the world can create a wallet and access decentralized networks and financial services (DeFi, NFTs).

interoperable.title: Interoperable
interoperable.description: Your wallet is a universal passport for the decentralized web.

globalX.title: Global X
globalX.description: The wallet operates on a borderless financial infrastructure (blockchain).

multiLayerSecurity.title: Multi-layer security protections
multiLayerSecurity.description: Advanced security measures to keep your assets safe

defiSupport.title: DeFi, DApp, GameFi and NFT supported

oneChainSupport.title: Supporting OneChain, SUI and so on

newsletter.title: Subscribe to our Newsletter
newsletter.description: Your secure and trusted crypto wallet to explore blockchain

footer.description: We insist on open technology community and we welcome all developers to build a more convenient, secure and richer blockchain world together

about.title: About OneWallet
about.subtitle: Building the future of digital finance

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To democratize access to decentralized finance and make blockchain technology accessible to everyone, everywhere.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: A world where financial sovereignty is a universal right, powered by secure, user-friendly blockchain technology.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: A diverse group of blockchain experts, security specialists, and UX designers working towards a decentralized future.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with our team

info.title: Get in Touch
info.description: Have questions about OneWallet? We're here to help.

questions.question: How do I create a wallet?
questions.answer: Download OneWallet from the Chrome Web Store or App Store, then follow the setup wizard to create your new wallet securely.

questions.question: Is OneWallet secure?
questions.answer: Yes, OneWallet uses multi-layer security including encryption, secure key storage, and advanced authentication to protect your assets.

questions.question: Which blockchains are supported?
questions.answer: OneWallet supports multiple blockchains including OneChain, Ethereum, SUI, and many others in the ecosystem.
